definition: A concoction or elixir that is often associated with mythical or magical properties, typically used in folklore, fairy tales, or fantasy literature. It is often depicted as a potion or drink that possesses supernatural or transformative abilities when consumed.

examples.english: The magic potion has magical powers.

examples.german: Der Zaubertrank wurde von einem alten Hexenmeister gebraut.
examples.english: The magic potion was brewed by an old sorcerer.

examples.german: Der Zaubertrank verleiht dem Trinker übernatürliche Fähigkeiten.
examples.english: The magic potion gives the drinker supernatural abilities.

examples.german: Der Zaubertrank ist eine wichtige Zutat in vielen Märchen.
examples.english: The magic potion is an important ingredient in many fairy tales.

examples.german: Der Zaubertrank kann Flüche brechen und Krankheiten heilen.
examples.english: The magic potion can break curses and heal illnesses.
